cofh.lib.gui.element

Class TabBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • cofh.lib.gui.element.ElementBase
      • cofh.lib.gui.element.TabBase

  • public abstract class TabBase
extends ElementBase
    Base class for a tab element. Has self-contained rendering methods and a link back to the GuiBase it is a part of.
